article_title: John Oliver Mocks Media for Repeatedly Declaring ‘End of Obamacare’
article_text:
Is this the end of Obamacare? It’s a question that seemingly gets asked quite a lot on cable news, as shown to humorous effect by John Oliver on HBO’s Last Week Tonight.

Stringing together five years worth of clips from CNN, MSNBC, Fox News and others, Oliver makes a convincing argument to news writers: find a new line, guys.

og.description: Is this the end of Obamacare? It's a question that seemingly gets asked quite a lot on cable news.

Is this the end of Obamacare?
